SEARCH
Package com.instancesobp.evaluationResults.graphics

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.instancesobp.evaluationResults.graphics.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Utility class for drawing graphical elements on a panel. This class provides static methods to draw lines, strings, rectangles, and measurement lines (both horizontal and vertical) with support for different graphic orientations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergio Gil Borr√°s

  • Method Details

    • drawLine

      public static void drawLine(Graphics g, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int graphicPosition)
      Draws a line on the graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      x1 - The starting x-coordinate of the line.
      y1 - The starting y-coordinate of the line.
      x2 - The ending x-coordinate of the line.
      y2 - The ending y-coordinate of the line.
      graphicPosition - The orientation of the graphic (horizontal or vertical).

    • drawString

      public static void drawString(Graphics g, String text, int x1, int y1, int graphicPosition)
      Draws a string on the graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      text - The text to be drawn.
      x1 - The x-coordinate of the text.
      y1 - The y-coordinate of the text.
      graphicPosition - The orientation of the graphic (horizontal or vertical).

    • drawRect

      public static void drawRect(Graphics g, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int graphicPosition)
      Draws a rectangle on the graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      x1 - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
      y1 - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
      x2 - The width of the rectangle.
      y2 - The height of the rectangle.
      graphicPosition - The orientation of the graphic (horizontal or vertical).

    • fillRect

      public static void fillRect(Graphics g, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int graphicPosition)
      Fills a rectangle on the graphics context.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      x1 - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
      y1 - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
      x2 - The width of the rectangle.
      y2 - The height of the rectangle.
      graphicPosition - The orientation of the graphic (horizontal or vertical).

    • drawLineMeasureH

      public static void drawLineMeasureH(Graphics g, String text, int x1, int x2, int y, int graphicPosition)
      Draws a horizontal measurement line with markers and a label.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      text - The label to display on the measurement line.
      x1 - The starting x-coordinate of the line.
      x2 - The ending x-coordinate of the line.
      y - The y-coordinate of the line.
      graphicPosition - The orientation of the graphic (horizontal or vertical).

    • drawLineMeasureV

      public static void drawLineMeasureV(Graphics g, String text, int y1, int y2, int x, int graphicPosition)
      Draws a vertical measurement line with markers and a label.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics context to draw on.
      text - The label to display on the measurement line.
      y1 - The starting y-coordinate of the line.
      y2 - The ending y-coordinate of the line.
      x - The x-coordinate of the line.
      graphicPosition - The orientation of the graphic (horizontal or vertical).

    • drawLineMeasureVL

      public static void drawLineMeasureVL(Graphics g, String text, int y1, int y2, int x, int graphicPosition)

      Parameters:

      text - The label to display on the measurement line.
      y1 - The starting y-coordinate of the line.
      y2 - The ending y-coordinate of the line.
      x - The x-coordinate of the line.
      graphicPosition - The orientation of the graphic (horizontal or vertical).
